readable.title: 2518219912_f47214aa16
readable.content: A little girl holds the water hose for the dog to drink from . A little girl is holding up a yellow water hose and water is pouring out and the big brown dog is drinking the water . A young girl holds a running water hose , from which a brown dog next to her is drinking . the dog is drinking the water being squirted from the hose by the little girl . The little girl is holding a yellow hose for a brown dog .
